## Quarto

Quarto enables you to weave together content and executable code into a finished document. To learn more about Quarto see <https://quarto.org>.

## Running Code

When you click the **Render** button a document will be generated that includes both content and the output of embedded code. You can embed code like this:

```{r}
1 + 1
```

You can add options to executable code like this

```{r}
#| echo: false
2 * 2
```

The `echo: false` option disables the printing of code (only output is displayed).

##Apresentação

o conjunto de dados será o de ferrugem do café na Etiópia que está no arquivo nuvem.

##Importa os dados

usaremos a função gsheet2tbl() do pacote \[gsheet\] para carregar os dados no ambiente.

```{r}
library(gsheet)
cr <-  gsheet2tbl("https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1bq2N19DcZdtax2fQW9OHSGMR0X2__Z9T/edit?gid=1871397229#gid=1871397229")


```

##Vizualiza os dados

Usaremos função datatable() do pacote \[DT\].

```{r}
library(DT)
datatable(cr)

```

Gráficos

```{r}
library(tidyverse)

cr |> 
  ggplot(aes(lon, lat))+
  geom_point()

library(rnaturalearth)
library(rnaturalearthhires)

remotes:: install_github("ropensci/rnaturalearthhires")

ETH <- ne_states(country = "Ethiopia", returnclass = "sf")

library(tidyverse)
library(ggthemes)
library(ggspatial)


ETH |>
ggplot()+ 
  geom_sf(fill = "gray80") + 
  geom_point(data = cr, aes(lon, lat, color = inc))+
  scale_color_viridis_c()+
  theme_minimal()+
  theme(legend.position = "bottom")+
  annotation_scale(location = "tl")+
  annotation_north_arrow(location = "br", which_north = "true")+
  labs(title = "Ferrugem do café na Etiópia", x = "Longitude", Y = "Latiitude", subtitle = "Levantamento em fazendas", caption = "Fonte: Del Pnte et al. (2025)", color = "Incidência (%)")
ggsave("mapa_etiopia.png", bg = "white", width = 10)
```
